Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Sapecin C  (natural AMPs; defensins; UCSS1a; 3S=S; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification:  Three disulfid bonds: 3,30; 16,36; 20,38.Activity: Activity against B. megaterium IAM 1166, B. circulans IFO 3967, C. glutamicum ATCC1 3059(IC50 <0.2 ug/ml), S. aureus ATCC6538B (IC50 0.6 ug/ml), S. aureus MR1587 (IC50 0.9 ug/ml), S. epidermidis IFO 3762(IC50 1.2 ug/ml), S. mutans 6515t (IC50 2.6 ug/ml), S. sanguis ST3t (IC50 0.9 ug/ml), S. salivarius HHTt (IC50 0.7 ug/ml) and S. bovis ATCC27960t (IC50 2.4 ug/ml).Updated 4/2019
Literature Information.Author: Yamada K, Natori S.1993
Literature Information.Title: Purification, sequence and antibacterial activity of two novel sapecin homologues from Sarcophaga embryonic cells: similarity of sapecin B to charybdotoxin.
